'''/takepicture''' is a [[command]] used to take a photo of a [[player]], or to take a photo from a player's point of view.

== Syntax ==
: <code>takepicture &lt;targetCamera&gt; &lt;targetPlayer&gt;</code>
: <code>takepicture &lt;cameraSpawnLocation&gt; &lt;targetPlayer&gt;</code>
: <code>takepicture &lt;targetPlayer&gt;</code>

== Arguments ==
: <code>&lt;targetPlayer&gt;</code> is the name of the player (or a target selector) whose photo you wish to take.

: <code>&lt;targetCamera&gt;</code> is the name of the player (or a target selector) whose camera perspective you wish to use to take the photo.

: <code>&lt;cameraSpawnLocation&gt;</code> is the coordinate of the camera perspective you wish to use to take the photo.
